experience.title: Research & Technology Co-Op (Python Engineer/Developer)
experience.description: I develop in-lab test automation, data-related cloud jobs, and software tools to improve the quality and efficiency of research.

experience.title: Robotics Lab Assistant (C# Developer)
experience.description: Engineered GUI interfaces on both front and back end to control robots remotely.

projects.title: My Portfolio Site
projects.description: The website you are currently seeing! After having spent a couple of months learning React and HTML on and off, I wanted to build a simple website to test and improve my newly learned skills. This is the outcome!

projects.title: IPod Ebay Listing
projects.description: A webapp that aggregates IPod listings and classifies them for the user's convenience.

projects.title: IOT Temperature Sensor
projects.description: A custom built home temperature sensor that connects to a back-end server written in C#. Server allows for multiple connectons at once.

projects.title: Mock-Up Shop App
projects.description: A mock-up store front app a team of four and I devloped. A user is able to edit their cart, browse and filter the catalog, and navigate between store pages.

projects.title: LED Matrix Smart Clock
projects.description: A fully customizable smart clock with placeable widgets. Users would be able to move, add, and remove widgets around the 64x32 matrix of LEDs. The wigets available were time and weather.

projects.title: Minesweeper Clone
projects.description: A clone of Minesweeper made in Python using Pygame. It has 3 selectable difficulties that adjusts the size of the game and number of bombs.
